Message.Msg: Selling naked calls on Google? I'll pass.
You are right. I actually had a spread. Bought 20 $905 calls at the same time. The margin requirement is a whole lot less. I don't have the margin funds for a naked spread.

Topic.Title: Next week's catalyst == Event on July 10th and 11th

Message.Msg: i hope not. i prefer goog just stay flat a few more days so the options deflate .
earnings could be pretty good but after seeing samsung was not so good. goog could make a huge move either way

Message.Title: Android is history
Message.Msg: Android, iOS are on verge of extinction, as first the developing markets and then advanced markets discover Firefox OS and HTML5 , mobile/small screen friendly web. The so-called 'app' for android and iOS is history, as well. HTML5, CSS and Javascript are the 'apps' of the future for mobile computing.

Message.Title: Goog staged the beginning of a breakout on Friday
Message.Msg: trading over 895 intraday and finally closing over the 890-92 resistance area. Next stop on the chart is 900 with some resistance then the 910 area for sure. After that there is not much in the way of a test to the 52 week high...GLTA

Message.Title: GOOG Has Regained Important Chart Levels
Message.Msg: GOOG has regained important resistance levels in moving back above $883 and $891. I was calling for a very bearish move in GOOG ahead of its earnings should it have stayed below those resistance levels. However, GOOG now looks refreshed and ready to do one of two things: channel higher amidst low volatility, or explode to the upside. Holding $883-$891 now becomes critically important in confirming the recent bottom and putting a move to new all time highs ahead of earnings on the table. Above $900 and I'm chasing. Until then I'm watching and waiting.
